data.name: Air Response Unit

Flying, vigilance
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

data.name: Basri, Tomorrow's Champion

{W}, {T}, Exert Basri: Create a 1/1 white Cat creature token with lifelink. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

When you cycle this card, Cats you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

Vigilance

Whenever this creature attacks while saddled, untap it and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

data.name: Canyon Vaulter
data.oracle_text: Whenever this creature saddles a Mount or crews a Vehicle during your main phase, that Mount or Vehicle gains flying until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Some seek thrills in watching the show. Some seek thrills in being the show.

data.oracle_text:
Mounts and Vehicles you control get +1/+1.
This creature saddles Mounts and crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.
data.flavor_text: Cloudspire's might comes from its unparalleled coordination.

• Collision Course deals X damage to target creature, where X is the number of permanents you control that are creatures and/or Vehicles.

—Redshift

Interface Ace

This creature saddles Mounts and crews Vehicles using its toughness rather than its power.
Whenever this creature becomes tapped during your turn, untap it. This ability triggers only once each turn.

data.oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

data.flavor_text: The Quickbeasts' diet of aether makes them capable of astonishing maneuvers.

data.name: Ride's End
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a tapped permanent.

data.flavor_text: Their race ended much the same way it began, walking through a sandstorm on a world that ended long ago.

data.name: Roadside Assistance

Enchant creature or Vehicle

Enchanted permanent gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.
data.flavor_text: No road has to be traveled alone.

data.name: Salvation Engine

Other artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.

"The Guidelight Voyagers seem to exhibit more humanity than their flesh-and-blood competitors."
—Pia Nalaar

Flying

Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name cost {2} more to activate.

All creatures and Vehicles lose indestructible until end of turn, then destroy all creatures and Vehicles.

data.flavor_text:
"For most people? The odds would be insurmountable," Daretti said.
"But we're not most people," Pia replied.

data.flavor_text:
Control lost is adventure gained.
—Keelhauler proverb

data.name: Caelorna, Coral Tyrant
data.flavor_text: For centuries, she grew in her benthic home, safe from Muraganda's moonfalls, feeding on the raw leylines that run below the water. When she emerged, the coral depths she called home came with her.

When this Vehicle enters, gain control of target creature an opponent controls for as long as you control this Vehicle. That creature can't attack or block for as long as you control this Vehicle.

data.flavor_text: By the end of the race, few of the Aether Rangers' vehicles resembled what they started as.

The druid's aim was dead on. But their
choice of target was dead wrong.

data.name: Spikeshell Harrier

data.name: Stock Up
data.oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Flying

Exchange control of target artifact or creature you control and target artifact or creature an opponent controls.

data.name: Transit Mage
data.oracle_text: When this creature enters, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 4 or 5, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
data.flavor_text: "Remember: You can take the wheel if you want, but *I* choose the music."

data.name: Unstoppable Plan
data.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, untap all nonland permanents you control.
data.flavor_text: Jace knew that if he just had time to explain his plan, he would find support. Unfortunately, time was in short supply.

Start your engines! (If you have no speed, it starts at 1. It increases once on each of your turns when an opponent loses life. Max speed is 4.)

data.flavor_text: At the Tombs Before Time, the living of Amonkhet made vital alliances with the honored dead.

data.name: Bloodghast
data.oracle_text:
Bloodghast can't block.
Bloodghast has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may return Bloodghast from your graveyard to the battlefield.
data.flavor_text: Summoning it is easy. Controlling it is another matter.

Whenever a player casts a spell they don't own, that player creates a Treasure token.
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, its controller looks at the top card of that opponent's library and exiles it face down. They may play that card for as long as it remains exiled. Mana of any type can be spent to cast a spell this way.

"This is still a negotiation. We haven't broken anything... yet."

data.name: Kalakscion, Hunger Tyrant
data.flavor_text: Galadak's Scar is full of craters which are home to terrifying predators of immense size and savagery. Yet even among such company, Kalakscion—and her insatiable hunger—eclipses them all.

data.name: Maximum Overdrive
data.oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Compared to the Fuel Wars on Gastal, this Grand Prix is a thrilling vacation.

data.name: Momentum Breaker

{2}, Sacrifice this enchantment: You gain life equal to your speed.
